schools.name: AWS Training and Certification
schools.description: This certification validates technical expertise in deployment, management, and operations on the AWS platform.

schools.name: ETNA - École des technologies numériques avancées (IT school)
schools.degree: Professional Master's Degree - Software Architecture & Application Development
schools.description: Work-study program that combines full-stack development, software architecture, and specialized fields like mobile apps and cloud computing, providing hands-on experience in real-world projects to prepare graduates for high-demand roles in tech.

schools.name: EPITECH - European institute of technology
schools.description: Completed a 3-year program at Epitech in IT engineering, focused on software development, network security, and real-world projects using Java, Python, Linux, and low level programing languages like C and C++.

schools.name: ISTOM - École supérieure d'aggro-dévelopement international
schools.programType: Preparatory cycle of the engineering program
schools.description: Focuses on building a solid foundation in science, agriculture, and development through both theoretical knowledge and hands-on experience.

schools.name: Lycée Jean-Baptiste Poquelin
schools.degree: French Baccalauréat in Science and Laboratory Technology (STL), specialization in Human Biology
schools.description: High school diploma graduated with high honor
